Text: kinda new to downloading android games... how do i put it on my HTC One S?
Just put it on your sd card. install astro file manager or any file manager from the play store and browse for it through there.
lol the htc one s doesnt have a sd card slot it jus has 16gb internal so i jus put it in there huh?
If you can't use an Sd Card, then just plug your device into your PC with a Micro Usb cable, and load the game onto it that way. It worked that was for my Nexus 7.
